but for.translation[0].definitions[0].de: used when you are saying that something would have happened if something or someone else had not prevented it
but for.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: But for these interruptions, the meeting would have finished earlier.
The score could have been higher but for some excellent goalkeeping by Simon.
I might never have got to university but for you.
but for.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: All was silent but for the sound of the wind in the trees.
